data.title: Third party providers
data.meta_description: Learn about list of Third Party Providers, Ad-server Partners, Bidder Partners and User Sync Providers.
data.text:
The below list is a list of Xandrâs third-party partners which may receive Platform Data and other Information (as defined in Xandrâs Platform Privacy Policy) as a result of their partnership with Xandr or due to their partnerships with Xandr customers using Xandrâs technology. Individuals and customers may share such information with these partners using Xandr technology depending on their specific circumstances, settings and controls in place. If you would like to opt-out or exercise other privacy rights, please visit https://privacycenter.xandr.com.
